li.p:
an m \times n matrix where the entries in each row form a sequence 1,x_i,x_i^2,x_i^3,\dotsc,x_i^n for some number x_i, so that the full matrix has form
\begin{bmatrix} 1 \amp x_1 \amp x_1^2 \amp \cdots \amp x_1^n \\ 1 \amp x_2 \amp x_2^2 \amp \cdots \amp x_2^n \\ \vdots \amp \vdots \amp \vdots \amp \amp \vdots \\ 1 \amp x_m \amp x_m^2 \amp \cdots \amp x_m^n \end{bmatrix}
